Posts.Content: Feb 2, 2010 06:47PM klp1 wrote: I had BMX in April 09 and MS Free Tram in Sept 09.  I found stretchy bras that fasten in the front at Walmart.  I found that racerback bras that I had to put on over my head were hard to manuever into and usually too tight for comfort.  I definitely bought a size or two bigger than I normally wear.  I found compression underwear at Target.  I believe they were Hanes.  Kohls also has their own brand of compression underwear.  Walmart, too. The surgical tape is called Tegaderm.  I am allergic to it, too.  I added it to my allergies list so it's listed on my hospital allergy bracelet.  I ask for paper tape instead.  They have to use more of it to hold, but it prevents any skin problem afterwards.
Posts.Title: post surgical ? allvirgo71 klp1
